name: A.L.T.
description: '''Alvin Lowell Trivette''' (born May 17, 1970), known as '''A.L.T.''', is an American [[Rapping|rapper]]. known for the 1991 hit "Lowrider (On the Boulevard)" (as a member of [[Latin Alliance (album)|Latin Alliance]]) and the 1992 hit "[[Tequila (Champs song)#Covers|Tequila]]" (No. 48 on the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]]).
